attributes.action:
Do not ban the American bully breed 
We will not vote or stand with TORIES
attributes.additional_details:
All dog breeds can be dangerous or unpredictable it’s not breed specific there should not be banned breeds 
Instead the general public should be educated on dog breeds and dog ownership 
Bring harsher penalties/prison time for irresponsible dog owners that put the public at risk regardless of breed
attributes.background:
We want the American bully breed to stay as it is no restrictions on the breeding/sale /possession of a American bully 
We should have the right to keep/breeds/sell any dog breed of our choice

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509
